Description.Text:
Position Hotel Europa has been recently renovated and is situated in the new residential block called Citt√† Giardino, at a very few steps from the sea, in front of a new sandbathing establishment and thermal baths, not far away from tennis courts.
Restaurant A rich continental breakfast is waiting for you. The restaurant always offers at its guests a varied and refined menu, which is conceived to satisfy the multiple needs of many different customers.
More Informations Many bicycles are available to speed up your movings and for pleasant outings. There is a private indoor and outdoor car park. Internet wi-fi connection is freely at your disposal in the hall.
